scripts.watch-css: npm run build-css && node-sass-chokidar --include-path ./src --include-path ./node_modules src/ -o src/ --watch --recursive
scripts.start: cross-env NODE_PATH=./src PORT=3002 npm-run-all -p watch-css start-js
scripts.start:server: cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_PATH=./src nodemon --watch server server
scripts.build: npm run build-css && cross-env NODE_PATH=./src react-scripts build
